metadata.title: CVE-2020-27348 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
In some conditions, a snap package built by snapcraft includes the currentdirectory in LD_LIBRARY_PATH, allowing a malicious snap to gain codeexecution within the context of another snap if both plug the homeinterface or similar. This issue affects snapcraft versions prior to 4.4.4,prior to 2.43.1+16.04.1, and prior to 2.43.1+18.04.1.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-27348` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

snapcraft - 2.43.1+18.04.1
snapcraft-examples - 2.43.1+18.04.1
snapcraft-parser - 2.43.1+18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: snapcraft package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.43.1+18.04.1').
